scenarios.name: TestScenario1
scenarios.scenario: User launches the game, selects a category, answers all questions correctly, and exits the game

scenarios.name: TestScenario2
scenarios.scenario: User launches the game, selects a category, answers all questions incorrectly, and exits the game

scenarios.name: TestScenario3
scenarios.scenario: User launches the game, selects a category, answers some questions correctly and some incorrectly, and exits the game

scenarios.name: TestScenario4
scenarios.scenario: User launches the game but exits before selecting a category

scenarios.name: TestScenario5
scenarios.scenario: User launches the game, selects a category, but exits before answering any questions
